thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 20 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: Russian sports min says Olympic curler could not have doped deliberately -agencies

author: Reuters Editorial
title: Russian sports min says Olympic curler could not have doped deliberately -agencies
text:
MOSCOW, Feb 20 (Reuters) - Russian Sports Minister Pavel Kolobkov said on Tuesday a Russian curling medallist accused of doping at the Olympics in Pyeongchang could not have taken the substance deliberately, Russian news agencies reported.
“It’s obvious that in this particular case, the athlete could not have intentionally used a prohibited substance, it just does not make any sense,” the agencies Quote: d Kolobkov as saying. (Reporting by Polina Nikolskaya; Editing by Jack Stubbs)
